name: Rusty Slicer
description: Still slices... probably. Just don’t lick it.

name: Dry Jacket
description: Smells weird, but hey, it blocks a punch or two.

name: Tagliatello
description: Sharper than Nonna’s tongue at dinner.

name: Parmesuit
description: Smells like cheese. Tastes like victory.

name: Spicy Red
description: One slice and they’ll be cryin’ arrabbiata.

name: Lasagna Layer
description: Heavy, delicious, and stacked with defense.

name: Dragon Noodle
description: A legendary blade that slurps back.

name: Nonna's Dress
description: Woven with love and dragon rage. Don’t spill sauce on it.
